hero.headline: IME Medical Record Summary Software That Scales
hero.subheadline: IME companies handle thousands of record sets every month. Dodonai's AI processes, summarizes, and organizes them in minutes — so physicians can focus on evaluations, not paperwork.

sections.heading: The IME Workflow Challenge
paragraphs: Before an IME physician can walk into the exam room, someone on the team has to distill 500 pages of records into something useful. That pre-exam review is the bottleneck.

In-house staff and outsourced review services both struggle with consistency and scalability at IME volumes. When volume spikes, quality drops or deadlines slip. When you hire more reviewers, training and oversight costs climb. Manual record review just doesn't scale efficiently.

Dodonai's {{link:/ai-medical-record-summaries-chronologies/|AI medical record summarization platform}} eliminates this bottleneck. It automates the extraction and organization of key medical data, giving IME physicians a structured, chronological summary they can review in minutes before each examination — faster turnaround, lower per-case costs, and consistency that manual processes can't match.

sections.heading: Built for IME Operations at Scale

cards.title: Fast Turnaround
cards.description: Complete summaries and chronologies from even the largest record sets, delivered in minutes. Physicians get the pre-exam context they need without delays.

cards.title: Consistent Output Quality
cards.description: Every summary follows the same structured format — regardless of volume or complexity. No variability from fatigue or reviewer experience.

cards.title: HIPAA-Compliant Infrastructure
cards.description: SOC 2 Type II certified with signed BAAs for every client. All records get AES-256 encryption in transit and at rest — the compliance standard IME operations require.

cards.title: Bulk Processing
cards.description: Whether you handle 50 cases a week or 5,000, upload and process hundreds of record sets simultaneously. The platform scales to match your volume without additional staff.

cards.title: Customizable Report Templates
cards.description: Configure output structure, detail level, and focus areas to match your physicians' preferences. {{link:/dodonai-extract-and-draft-agents/|Extract and Draft Agents}} let you build reusable templates aligned with your reporting standards.

cards.title: 70-90% Lower Per-Case Costs
cards.description: Per-page pricing means you pay only for what you process — at a fraction of outsourced review costs. No seats, no minimums.

items.title: Upload the Claimant's Medical Records
items.description: Upload the complete record set to Dodonai's secure platform. The system handles PDFs of any size — including scanned documents and handwritten notes — and lets you specify focus areas like specific injuries, providers, or date ranges.

items.title: AI Generates the Summary and Chronology
items.description: Dodonai reads every page, identifies key medical events, and produces a structured chronological timeline alongside a narrative summary. Diagnoses, procedures, medications, and provider encounters are extracted automatically, with every data point tracing to the source page.

items.title: Review, Adjust, and Distribute
items.description: Verify AI output with side-by-side source linking, filter by date or provider, make adjustments, and export in PDF, Word, or Excel for distribution to examining physicians.

faq.question: How does Dodonai handle the volume of records IME companies process?
faq.answer: Dodonai handles demand spikes without performance drops. Upload hundreds of record sets at once — no batch limits, no per-user seats. Throughput is limited only by upload speed.

faq.question: Can we customize the summary format to match our physicians' preferences?
faq.answer: Yes. Configure structure, detail level, and focus areas for each summary. {{link:/dodonai-extract-and-draft-agents/|Extract and Draft Agents}} let you build reusable templates matching your exact reporting standards.

faq.question: What types of medical records can the AI process?
faq.answer: Digital PDFs, scanned documents, faxed records, and files with handwritten physician notes. The AI OCR engine extracts text from low-quality scans so no relevant information is missed.

faq.question: How does Dodonai ensure HIPAA compliance for IME workflows?
faq.answer: AES-256 encrypted in transit and at rest. SOC 2 Type II certified with signed BAAs for every client. Records never enter a training pipeline. You set your own retention policies and delete on your schedule.

faq.question: What is the cost compared to outsourced medical record review?
faq.answer: Per-page pricing, far lower than outsourced review. Most IME companies see 70-90% cost reductions per record set. Visit our {{link:/pricing/|pricing page}} for current rates.

faq.question: Can Dodonai integrate with our existing case management system?
faq.answer: Yes. Dodonai offers API access and integrations with common document management platforms. Our team can also build custom integrations for your IME workflow.
